mapper.select: SELECT PARTS_ID partsId, EQUIP_ID equipId, PARTS_NO partsNo, PARTS_NAME partsName, PARTS_MODEL partsModel, PARTS_AGENCE partsAgence, MAINT_CYCLE maintCycle, LATEST_MAINT_TIME latestMaintTime, NEXT_MAINT_TIME nextMaintTime, RELATE_PERSON relatePerson, RELATE_MOBILE relateMobile FROM tb_equip_parts WHERE EQUIP_ID = #{equipId} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE
